https://tmrev.io/movie/395852-Baby X 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/VodCzUfgWQaiL6Xa74J5WdCee2.jpg In this animated short, a child only known as X is raised without gender norms as part of a social experiment. X is loved by its classmates but despised by adults because no one knows if it is a boy or girl. Based on the book "X, a Fabulous Child's Story" by Lois Gould. Baby X
